content.rendered:
RAISING THE BENCHMARK FOR APARTMENT LIVING IN THE MIDRAND AREA

Located on the corner of Olifantsfontein Road and Lever Road in Midrand, this secure estate is conveniently located near the N1 arterial highway. It consists of eight apartment blocks with an impressive clubhouse. The clubhouse has a laundry facility, meeting room and braai facilities – all of which can be booked out for private functions. The double-storey gym and aerobics studio overlooks the children’s play park. This facility is located next to the large swimming pool with a separate shallow side to accommodate the entire family. The units were designed to be spacious and easy to furnish. Our tenants also enjoy free uncapped internet, as well as free weekly gym training sessions.

Contact Joy
Contact Ernest
BROCHURE
ESTATE RULES
ESTATE VIDEO
ESTATE LOCATION

ESTATE FEATURES

Bachelor, 1-bed, 2-bed and 3-bed apartments for rent
Sizes range from 30m² – 76m²
Rent from R6,200pm – R10,800pm
Modern open plan layouts with quality finishes
Tight security with biometric fingerprint access
Best value for money lifestyle in this area
Close proximity to retail centres
Free internet in each apartment
Care-free living as maintenance is included
Free weekly activities and social events for kids and adults

OUTDOOR FACILITIES

External Activity Park
Walking Trails
Children’s Play Park
Braai Facilities
Swimming Pool

INDOOR FACILITIES

Clubhouse with Communal Lounges
Double-storey Gym (FREE Weekly Classes)
Meeting Room
Laundromat

TAKE A LOOK AT SOME OF OUR LAYOUTS BELOW

Sagewood IS ON SHOW 7 DAYS A WEEK FROM 9:00 UNTIL 17:00
